attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the pool instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the pool instance.

attributes.name: objectId
attributes.description: Unique object ID of SYSAPI::MLUPool object.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the pool, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Pool name.

attributes.name: operationalStatus
attributes.description: Operational statuses for the pool.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Pool description.

attributes.name: storageResourceType
attributes.description: Storage resource type for which the pool was primary created

attributes.name: raidType
attributes.description: RAID type with which the pool is configured. A value of Mixed indicates that the pool consists of multiple RAID types.

attributes.name: sizeFree
attributes.description: Amount of free space available in the pool.

attributes.name: sizeTotal
attributes.description: Total amount of space (used space plus free space) in the pool.

attributes.name: sizeUsed
attributes.description: Amount of space used by the pool's associated storage resources.

attributes.name: sizeSubscribed
attributes.description: Amount of space requested by the pool's associated storage resources. When this value is over the total size of the pool, the pool is oversubscribed.

attributes.name: alertThreshold
attributes.description: Threshold at which the system generates notifications about the amount of space remaining in the pool, specified as a percent. <p/> This threshold is based on the percentage of allocated storage in the pool compared to the total pool size.

attributes.name: poolSpaceHarvestHighThreshold
attributes.description:
(Applies when the automatic deletion of snapshots based on pool space usage is enabled for the system and pool.)

Pool used space high threshold at which the system automatically deletes snapshots in the pool, specified as a percent with .01% granularity.

This threshold is based on the percentage of used space in the pool compared to the total pool size. When the percentage of used space reaches this threshold, the system automatically deletes snapshots in the pool, until a low threshold is reached.

attributes.name: poolSpaceHarvestLowThreshold
attributes.description:
(Applies when the automatic deletion of snapshots based on pool space usage is enabled for the system and pool.)

Pool used space low threshold under which the system stops automatically deleting snapshots in the pool, specified as a percent with .01% granularity.

This threshold is based on the percentage of used pool space compared to the total pool size. When the percentage of used space in the pool falls below this threshold, the system stops the automatic deletion of snapshots in the pool, until a high threshold is reached.

attributes.name: snapSpaceHarvestHighThreshold
attributes.description:
(Applies when the automatic deletion of snapshots based on snapshot space usage is enabled for the system and pool.)

Snapshot used space high threshold at which the system automatically deletes snapshots in the pool, specified as a percent with .01% granularity.

This threshold is based on the percentage of space used by pool snapshots compared to the total pool size. When the percentage of space used by snapshots reaches this threshold, the system automatically deletes snapshots in the pool, until a low threshold is reached.

attributes.name: snapSpaceHarvestLowThreshold
attributes.description:
(Applies when the automatic deletion of snapshots based on snapshot space usage is enabled for the system and pool.)

Snapshot used space low threshold under which the system stops automatically deleting snapshots in the pool, specified as a percent with .01% granularity.

This threshold is based on the percentage of space used by pool snapshots compared to the total pool size. When the percentage of space used by pool snapshots falls below this threshold, the system stops the automatic deletion of snapshots in the pool, until a high threshold is reached.

attributes.name: isFASTCacheEnabled
attributes.description:
(Applies if FAST Cache is supported on the system and the corresponding license is installed.) Indicates whether the FAST Cache is enabled for the pool. Values are:
  • true - FAST Cache is enabled for the pool.
  • false - FAST Cache is disabled for the pool.

attributes.name: tiers
attributes.description: Tiers in the pool, as defined by the poolTier resource type.

attributes.name: creationTime
attributes.description: Date and time when the pool was created.

attributes.name: isEmpty
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the pool is unused; that is, whether it has no storage resources provisioned from it. Values are:
  • true - Pool is unused.
  • false - Pool is used..

attributes.name: poolFastVP
attributes.description: (Applies if FAST VP is supported on the system and the corresponding license is installed.) FAST VP information for the pool, as defined by the poolFastVP resource type.

attributes.name: isHarvestEnabled
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the automatic deletion of snapshots through pool harvesting is enabled for the pool. Values are:
  • true - Automatic deletion of snapshots through pool harvesting is enabled for the pool.
  • false - Automatic deletion of snapshots through pool harvesting is disabled for the pool.

attributes.name: harvestState
attributes.description: Current state of pool space harvesting.

attributes.name: isSnapHarvestEnabled
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the automatic deletion of snapshots through snapshot harvesting is enabled for the pool. Values are:
  • true - Automatic deletion of snapshots through snapshot harvesting is enabled for the pool.
  • false - Automatic deletion of snapshots through snapshot harvesting is disabled for the pool.

attributes.name: metadataSizeSubscribed
attributes.description: Quantity of pool space requested by metadata.

attributes.name: snapSizeSubscribed
attributes.description: Quantity of pool space subscribed to by snapshots.

attributes.name: metadataSizeUsed
attributes.description: Quantity of pool space used by metadata.

attributes.name: snapSizeUsed
attributes.description: Quantity of pool space used by snapshots.

attributes.name: rebalanceProgress
attributes.description: (Applies if FAST VP is supported on the system and the corresponding license is installed.) Percent of work completed for data rebalancing.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
Indicates type of this pool. Values are:
  • Dynamic - It is dynamic pool.
  • Traditional - It is traditional pool.

attributes.name: isAllFlash
attributes.description:
Indicates whether this pool contains only Flash drives. Values are:
  • true - It is an all Flash pool.
  • false - This pool contains drives other than Flash drives.
